item.title: パンデミックの後、米国の映画館は、より大きなスクリーン、暖房付きの座席、より高価な軽食、その他のアップグレードに数百万ドルを費やし、映画ファンを呼び戻そうと考えている（Jane Margolies/New York Times）。
item.description:
Jane Margolies / New York Times:
After the pandemic, some US cinemas hope to lure back moviegoers by spending millions on larger screens, heated seats, pricier refreshments, and other upgrades  —  After scraping by during the pandemic, cinemas are hoping to lure back moviegoers by spending millions of dollars on upgrades.

item.title: 情報源はこちらPixarは5月23日、Disneyのリストラの一環として、ベテラン幹部2名を含む約1200名のスタッフのうち75名を削減、Pixarは2013年に最後に約30名を削減（Dawn Chmielewski/Reuters）
item.description:
Dawn Chmielewski / Reuters:
Sources: Pixar cut 75 roles out of ~1,200 staff, including two veteran executives, on May 23 as part of Disney's restructuring; Pixar last cut ~30 jobs in 2013  —  Walt Disney's (DIS.N) Pixar Animation Studios has eliminated 75 positions including those of two executives behind box office disappointment …

item.title: 共和党討論会開催に向けたテレビ局の売り込みの様子、情報源は？CNNは保守的なアウトレットと提携し、他のWBDチャンネルで討論会を放映することを申し出た（Axios)
item.description:
Axios:
A look at TV networks' pitches to host Republican debates; sources: CNN offered to partner with a conservative outlet and air the debate on other WBD channels  —  And who hosts those debates can have a significant impact on which contenders chose to participate, and how they perform.

item.title: 英国、ドイツ、スペイン、フランス、イタリアがFIFAと放送局に女子W杯の放映合意を呼びかけ、FIFAは「残念なオファー」とコメント（スカイニュース）
item.description:
Sky News:
The UK, Germany, Spain, France, and Italy call on FIFA and broadcasters to reach a deal to air the Women's World Cup; FIFA said the offers were “disappointing”  —  The joint statement comes weeks after the head of FIFA threatened not to show this year's tournament in the UK …

item.title: 1994年にデビッドとバーバラ・ミケルソンが設立したインターネット上の噂の事実確認サイト「Snopes」の盛衰と再生を深掘り（Chantel Tattoli/Fast Company）。
item.description:
Chantel Tattoli / Fast Company:
A deep dive into the rise, fall, and rebirth of Snopes, the fact-checking site for rumors on the internet founded by David and Barbara Mikkelson in 1994  —  America's premier fact-checking site was failed by the two men who had charge of it, critics say.  As Snopes turns a corner, here's the tale of what went so right—and so wrong.

item.title: ティモシー・バークの弁護士は、依頼人が「Fox Newsをハッキングした」ことを否定したが、バークがどこでビデオを見つけたかは語らず、代わりに憲法修正第1条の権利を擁護した（ワシントンポスト紙）
item.description:
Washington Post:
Timothy Burke's lawyer denies that his client “hacked Fox News” but does not say where Burke found the videos, instead offering a First Amendment rights defense  —  Federal investigators are probing the videos as a possible hack of Fox News.  But a lawyer for a former Deadspin …

item.title: Vimeoは、Apple TV、Android TV、Fire TV、Rokuアプリのサポートを2023年6月27日に終了する予定で、キャスティングによってユーザーに「より良い継続的な体験」を提供すると述べている（Todd Spangler/Variety）
item.description:
Todd Spangler / Variety:
Vimeo plans to end support for its Apple TV, Android TV, Fire TV, and Roku apps on June 27, 2023, saying casting will give users a “better ongoing experience”  —  Vimeo is ending support for its existing TV apps — with the video management and hosting provider telling customers they'll have a …

item.title: SECへの提出書類：ナスダックはBuzzFeedに対し、1株あたり最低1ドルを満たしていないとして上場廃止のリスクを警告し、BuzzFeedに2023年11月27日まで株価を上げるよう与えている（J. Clara Chan/The Hollywood Reporter）。
item.description:
J. Clara Chan / The Hollywood Reporter:
SEC filing: Nasdaq warns BuzzFeed that it risks delisting for not meeting the $1/share minimum, giving BuzzFeed until November 27, 2023 to raise its stock price  —  The media company, led by CEO Jonah Peretti, has until Nov. 27 to bring up its stock price, according to an SEC filing.

item.title: ArtifactがGPT-4を使ってクリックベイトタイトルを置き換える方法：まず、リクエストしたユーザーに対してのみ、次に人間のレビュアーが新しいタイトルをすべてのデフォルトにするかもしれない（Mike Krieger/Artifact News)
item.description:
Mike Krieger / Artifact News:
How Artifact will replace a clickbait title using GPT-4: first, only for users who request it, then a human reviewer may make the new title the default for all  —  At Artifact, we harness the power of AI and combine it with creative product design to improve the news & content experience for our users.

item.title: WBDのJB Perretteによると、HBO Maxの顧客層の〜70％が発売後1週間でMaxに乗り換え、Maxで視聴したコンテンツの〜20％がDiscovery+のものだったという（Joe Flint/Wall Street Journal）。
item.description:
Joe Flint / Wall Street Journal:
WBD's JB Perrette says ~70% of HBO Max's customer base switched to Max in the first week of its launch and ~20% of the content viewed on Max was from Discovery+  —  Warner Bros. Discovery said about 70% of its HBO Max customer base switched to its new Max streaming platform in the first week of its launch …

item.title: メモです：英VogueのEICエドワード・エニンフルは、2024年にVogueのグローバルクリエイティブ＆カルチャーアドバイザーに就任し、英Vogueの編集コンテンツ責任者を雇う予定（Vogue Business）
item.description:
Vogue Business:
Memo: British Vogue EIC Edward Enninful plans to become Vogue's global creative and cultural advisor in 2024 and hire a British Vogue head of editorial content  —  The British Vogue editor-in-chief will become editorial advisor in 2024.  —  To receive the Vogue Business newsletter, sign up here.

item.title: YouTube、「2020年およびその他の過去の米国大統領選挙で広範な不正、エラー、不具合が発生したという虚偽の主張」を進めるコンテンツの削除を中止（Sara Fischer/Axios）
item.description:
Sara Fischer / Axios:
YouTube stops removing content advancing “false claims that widespread fraud, errors, or glitches occurred in the 2020 and other past US Presidential elections”  —  In a reversal of its election integrity policy, YouTube will leave up content that says fraud …

item.title: 社内メモ：Insider CEOのHenry Blodget氏は、スタッフ全員に感謝し、Insider Unionのストライキを批判し、契約要求の一部を「実行不可能」と呼んでいる（Chris Roush/Talking Biz News）。
item.description:
Chris Roush / Talking Biz News:
Internal memo: Insider CEO Henry Blodget thanks all his staff, criticizes the Insider Union for its strike, and calls some of the contract demands “unworkable”  —  Insider chief executive officer Henry Blodget sent out the following after its editorial staff went on strike:  —  Team,

item.title: 破産判事は、Diamond Sports Groupが試合を放映し続けるためにMLB4球団に契約金全額を支払うよう裁定、Diamondはコスト削減を求めた（Dan Caesar/St.Louis Post-Dispatch）。
item.description:
Dan Caesar / St. Louis Post-Dispatch:
A bankruptcy judge rules that Diamond Sports Group must pay four MLB teams their full contract values to keep televising games; Diamond sought to cut its costs  —  After two long days of hearings, more than nine hours on Wednesday then a session Thursday that lasted until shortly after 6:30 p.m. …

item.title: ゲッティがロンドンの高等裁判所にStable Diffusionの英国での販売停止を要請、Stability AIがゲッティの画像でAIモデルを訓練したことによる著作権侵害を非難（Sam Tobin/Reuters)
item.description:
Sam Tobin / Reuters:
Getty asks London's High Court to stop UK sales of Stable Diffusion, accusing Stability AI of copyright infringement for training its AI model on Getty's images  —  Stock photo provider Getty Images has asked London's High Court for an injunction to prevent artificial intelligence company Stability AI …
